definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: The shipping charges for returning samples will be added to your final invoice.
sentences.chinese: 运费为返回的样品将增加来您最后的发货票。

sentences.english: Please indicate the consignor and consignee in the contract.
sentences.chinese: 请在合同中注明发货方及收货方。

sentences.english: B： By sea， please. Because of the high cost of railway transportation， we prefer sea transportation.
sentences.chinese: 请海运发货，铁路运输费用太高，我们愿意走海运。

sentences.english: The Shipper and the Chief Officer are discussing the torn bags of castor seeds at the Dispatch Office.
sentences.chinese: 发货人跟大副正在调度室谈论蓖麻籽袋子破损的事。

sentences.english: Today, there is also shipped a lot of drainage pipe and seamless pipe on site.
sentences.chinese: 今天，也有很多引流管和无缝管网站发货。

sentences.english: Staple the invoice to the receipt.
sentences.chinese: 把发货清单订到发票上。

sentences.english: The packing list should be indicated with shipping weight number and date of corresponding invoice.
sentences.chinese: 装箱单上应注明发货量及相应发票的编号和日期。

sentences.english: We'll effect delivery within two weeks after receipt of your order.
sentences.chinese: 收到贵公司的订单后，敝公司将在两周内发货。

sentences.english: We say we want a product to cometo market, but we sandbag the shipping schedule.
sentences.chinese: 我们说想让产品上市，却把发货日程一推再推。

sentences.english: The order is marked as delivered by setting the delivery day.
sentences.chinese: 通过设置送货日期，将订单标记为已发货。

sentences.english: The customs house shall examine the Archival Filing Form submitted by the consignor or consignee;
sentences.chinese: 海关应当对收发货人提交的《备案表》进行审核。

sentences.english: We also publish the goods status tracing information to the agencies and shippers .
sentences.chinese: 同时向国外代理和发货人提供货物追踪信息。

sentences.english: Please inform Stephy to arrange posting after payment is made.
sentences.chinese: 所以付款后请及时告诉店主安排发货。

sentences.english: Get notice of non-conforming parts before shipment .
sentences.chinese: 发货之前注意到了非标准件。

sentences.english: B. I just got notification from the bank about that invoice.
sentences.chinese: 我刚收到银行关于那张发货单的通知书。

definition: to accept delivery of goods/to pick up goods
to place an order/to order/an order (of goods)
to put together an order of goods
to order goods/to place an order
to return merchandise/to withdraw a product
to return a product for another item
to sign for the acceptance of sth (e.g. a delivery etc)
